version_description: Hey, Madden NFL 19 fans!  With this update, you’ll now have the ability to manage your Ultimate Team Auctions!  Connect to the Auction House anytime, anywhere.  Bid on items, access your Binder and post items for auction at the optimal price, utilizing recent sales data from across the Ultimate Team community.
This release fixes several bugs to make the app more steady and stable like the G.O.A.T. Tom Brady.

Hey, fans! With this update, the Companion app now connects with Madden NFL 20, giving you access to your Franchise and Ultimate Team anytime, anywhere. Note: If you would like to continue to use the app with Madden NFL 19, do not update your app at this time.

Hello, football fans! Our latest update provides enhancements to the MUT Auction House to make your experience as smooth as JuJu slicing through a defense, including:

•Pricing information for Active Auctions to help you set the perfect starting bid
•Filter and sorting improvements
•Quicker access to Recent Sales info when placing a bid

Plus, we’ve brought general UX improvements and fixes to improve stability onto the field. Thanks for playing!

Hey, fans! With this update, the Companion app now connects with Madden NFL 20, giving you access to your Franchise and Ultimate Team anytime, anywhere. Note: If you would like to continue to use the app with Madden NFL 19, do not update your app at this time.

The latest update to the Madden Companion App improves many aspects of the application. The updated user interface makes it easier than ever to explore the MUT auction house and with new visual updates and animations the app looks better than ever. We've also made various bug fixes and major improvements to stability.

Madden NFL 21 comes to the Madden Companion app! With this update you can start building your championship NFL team in Madden NFL 21 MUT and Franchise modes.

Note: If you would like to continue to use the app with Madden NFL 20, do not update your app at this time
